title: Router Store
contents:
Router Storelink

Bindings to connect the Angular Router with Store. During each router navigation cycle, multiple actions are dispatched that allow you to listen for changes in the router's state. You can then select data from the state of the router to provide additional information to your application.

Installationlink

npm install @ngrx/router-store --save yarn add @ngrx/router-store

Setuplink

import { StoreRouterConnectingModule, routerReducer } from '@ngrx/router-store'; import { AppComponent } from './app.component'; @NgModule({ imports: [ BrowserModule, StoreModule.forRoot({ router: routerReducer, }), RouterModule.forRoot([ // routes ]), // Connects RouterModule with StoreModule StoreRouterConnectingModule.forRoot(), ], bootstrap: [AppComponent], }) export class AppModule {}
